location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 5076/43 'Polish Minister of State: Middle East'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 3; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a letter from the Foreign Office to the Minister of State, Cairo, regarding Henryk Leon Strasburger, the newly appointed Minister in the Middle East for the Polish Government-in-Exile.
